description:
Powerful, Personal and Private web browser

Vivaldi is a web browser. But fun. It comes with a bunch of clever features built-in. It’s super flexible and does not track you.
- [Chromium] Upgraded to 130.0.6723.138
- [Crash] Related to certain profiles VB-107612
- [Crash][Extensions] After adding an extension controlling the startpage VB-110644
- [Keyboard] Close settings window fails with Ctl+W VB-108125
- [Keyboard][macOS] ⌘+W does not close a popup window VB-111306
